Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepysim.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the block.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        Block(byte[] last_hash,
      byte[] current_hash,
      java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> txs,
      java.lang.Integer time_stamp,
      java.lang.Integer creator,
      byte[] signature)
        This function generates the initial block.
        Parameters:
        last_hash - - the hash of the block before this block in the block chain
        current_hash - - the hash of this block
        txs - - the transactions in this block
        time_stamp - - the time of this block generated
        creator - - the number of the node generating this block
        signature - - the signature of this block
